Update and plotting

Updated .gitignore to ignore tabulated data for plotting and plots produced.

Wrote python script to take output matrices from deeptools and plot using matplotlib and seaborn.  Used for plotting metagenes with inter-quartiles range and scatterplots of mut vs. WT on a per-gene basis.
Update .gitignore

Major script edits

Major testing in scripts to generate correct comparisons and plots.

Correct choices are:
bamCoverage with spike-in normalization factor *10000000

bigwigCompare v input using ratio

bigwigCompare v 8WG16 using ratio

Edited PEFragmentSize and read_counter scripts to be more explicit about 'experimental' vs 'spike-in' files. Also edited SBATCH options with better memory and time requirements.

Initial commit of chip-seq data processing. Includes: '.gitignore' to not track data files (ex: .fastq.gz, .bw), 'genome/' directory with bowtie2 indices and annotation .bed files, 'scripts/' directory with slurm scripts for sbatch submissions, and 'README.md' file (work-in-progress) that describes the steps of the analysis and how to use this repository.
